pageProduct.name: Sukin Signature Antioxidant Eye Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Did you know that fine lines around the eyes are some of the first signs of ageing on the face? Fight the signs of premature ageing with our fragrance free, Signature Antioxidant Eye Serum! A blend of Plant Extracts including Aloe Vera, Cucumber and Burdock, rich in essential fatty acids offer light hydration to the delicate eye area, while oils from Rosehip, Evening Primrose and Borage help to fight the signs of ageing, reduce the appearance of fine lines and improve the skin’s texture! TIP: Pump a pea sized drop of serum onto the tip of your finger and lightly pat around the eye bone and lid.

Warnings

e.g. Avoid contact with the eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rose Hip), Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil (Borage), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Arctium Lappa Root Extract (Burdock), Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

After cleansing, gently apply serum around eye area. Can be used once or twice daily. Make sure your gently pat with fingertips, do not stretch or pull the skin around the eye area whilst applying
